findings.message: Internal inconsistency: Simulation Trace still says reconcile coverage is partial and open question deferred, but the Questions section explicitly marks this as resolved.
Confidence section still cites open question on reconcile variant as reason for lower delivery-readiness, which conflicts with the resolved status.
Approach confidence criteria still says What raises to >=90: answer the open question about reconcile variant, but that question is already marked resolved.
Manager override applies to both close and reconcile variants presented as remaining assumption — should be reframed as decided design choice.

review: Round 3 critique — score 8/10 — all findings are internal consistency issues from prior-round edits; no Critical findings. Final round.
